description:
Advanced API Debugging Proxy

Reqable is a flutter-based, cross-platform app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP(s) requests/responses with ease. Support Windows, macOS, linux, iOS and Android devices.

ğŸ [FIX] The bug where SOCKS proxy URLs were not syntax highlighted.
ğŸ [FIX] The bug where URL syntax highlighting for IPv6 addresses was abnormal.
ğŸ [FIX] The bug where IPv6 address requests were interrupted under SOCKS proxy.
ğŸ [FIX] The bug where URL was incorrect when creating IPv6 requests from the traffic list.
